title: Island Girls
description: Dear Diary, Did you know that if you upset the fire goddess of Hawaii, you'll have bad luck forever? I didn't -- until I upset her big-time! Now I have the worst luck ever. There's only one thing left to do -- figure out how to make an angry goddess happy! Ashley promised to help me out, but she can't. She threw a big party at our hotel -- and now she's in big trouble! -- Mary-Kate
author: Nancy Butcher
